Class AntSimGUI

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      AntSimGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class AntSimGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame

class AntSimGUI main window for ant simulation contains: 1. a control panel for setting up and running the simulation 2. a graphical view of the ant colony

See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
private  class AntSimGUI.ControlPanel
          inner class ControlPanel contains buttons for controlling the simulation, and displays the simulation time
